NEED A JOB? YOUR NEXT ON-CAMPUS POSITION IS WAITING FOR YOU.
 APPLY FOR JOBS







LEARN MORE. DO MORE. DISCOVER MORE. 
The Associated Students (AS) of CSU, Chico connects students to their ultimate college experience by employing, empowering, and engaging Wildcats through programs, services, and facilities created for students by students. 









 Wellness
 Diversity
 Service
 Sustainability




We are dedicated to creating an environment that provides policies and services that support campus wellbeing. 
More About Wellness




We are dedicated to advancing policies and practices that strengthen our commitment to diversity, inclusion, and equity. 
More About Diversity




We are dedicated to developing and producing programs and products that support and sustain our culture of service. 
More About Service




We are dedicated to cultivating culture by imparting practices that promote continuously viable environmental, social, and economic systems. 
More About Sustainability
